emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256).details: AUDIT FIX: Added nonReentrant and zero address validationWARNING: This function bypasses daily limits. Use only in emergencies.NOTE: Still requires vault to NOT be frozen for safety.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: AUDIT FIX: Added nonReentrant and zero address validation

params.amount: Amount of native ETH/USDC (18 decimals on Arc)
params.to: Recipient address (must be allowlisted and non-zero)

emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256).notice: Emergency withdraw by owner (bypasses daily limits but NOT allowlist)

setAllowlist(address,bool).notice: Add or remove address from allowlist

setFrozen(bool).notice: Freeze or unfreeze the vault (kill switch)

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Agent withdraws native ETH/USDC within policy limits
